description: This purpose of this module is to help the participants understand the unique challenges of Women in STEM such as gender stereotyping, bias, and lack of support. It also highlights the need to attract more talented women to the STEM field.

subcategories.name: Caselet | Gender Disparities in STEM | 25 Min
Article | Stop Undervaluing Exceptional Women | 25 Min
TEDx Talk 1 | Females in STEM - We Need More! | 10 Min
TEDx Talk 2 | The Future of STEM Depends on Diversity | 10 Min
